title: XP & Mission completion compensation
body:
https://image.prntscr.com/image/dLV43MJRShWwAN_9oT7jtw.png

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

http://prntscr.com/i00p3p

http://prntscr.com/i00r3t 

Do you know why this happened? I was really excited to buy a new champ today, I guess i'm gonna have to wait. Also I think my match history got really messed up, did a rollback occur? 

Just wondering if we will compensation for our XP & BE, since i've been playing for a while until I realize I wasn't getting anymore XP.

replies.body: Looks like you were experiencing the little visual bug that can happen sometimes, since your level is showing up correctly on our end and the missions were completed as well. Are you able to see the correct info now at least?
My friend and I had the same problem, and we we're like rly confused. We also wondered if we we're gonna get like some sorta reward for this
I don't think riot usually gives compensation but I feel like we should get something.

> [{quoted}](name=Sle,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BRlExj1A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-13T20:28:14.466+0000)
>
> I don't think riot usually gives compensation but I feel like we should get something.

I know right, I haven't gotten anything from riot besides mystery gifts which I did appreciate. They should send a mystery gift to people that'd be fun lol.
Compensation has been given somewhat? xD http://prntscr.com/i01lpb

I wasted quite a bit of time when i'm supposed to be doing my work rn lol, i'm just wondering if they will add the XP or BE into our accounts. (Probably not considering its riot xd) I haven't seem them do anything like that in the 4-5 years i've been playing.
